description: Index (1992-). Scholia and Scholia Reviews (volumes 1-20) have published 862 contributions by 392 scholars and academics at 193 universities and other institutions in 36 countries. Scholia and Scholia Reviews completed its twenty-year joint series in 2011. The quality of the scanned pages in Volumes 1-13 (1992-2004) will be improved progressively in 2012-2013. Volume 1 (1992) vi + 161 pp. Volume 2 (1993) vi + 166 pp. Volume 3 (1994) vi + 178 pp. Volume 4(1995) vi + 182 pp. Volume 5 (1996) vi + 194 pp. Volume 6 (1997) vi + 186 pp. Volume 7(1998) vi + 194 pp. Volume 8 (1999) vi + 190 pp. Volume 9 (2000) vi + 190 pp. Volume 10(2001) vi + 194 pp. Volume 11 (2002) vi + 178 pp. Volume 12 (2003) vi + 198 pp. Volume 13(2004) vi + 194 pp. Volume 14 (2005) vi + 190 pp. Volume 15 (2006) vi + 194 pp. Volume 16(2007) vi + 186 pp. Volume 17 (2008) vi + 182 pp. Volume 18 (2009) vi + 194 pp. Volume 19(2010) vi + 198 pp. Volume 20 (2011) vi + 222 pp. Index Volumes 1-20 (1992-2011)iv + 52 pp.
title: Index (1992-)
